description: Dolphin Bakery stands for taste, quality and service at prices no one can beat. A whole range of oven fresh bakery goodies including breads, buns and various flavored biscuits are their fast moving products. Their cakes and confectionary range which includes dry cakes and pastries with butter cream or fresh cream are a big hit with the customers. They serve a range of fast bites like Pizzas, Sandwiches, Burgers, Brownies, Pie, Tart and Doughnut. Their cool shakes and juices are worth a mention. A unique feature is the live baking gallery which can produce instant baked to order cakes in 20 minutes. Eggless pastries too are available at Dolphin. There are large number nutrient-rich items inclusive of cakes, pastries and chocolates.
address: Dolphins, No 313, Dewans Road, Ramavilas Road, Subbarayanakere, Chamrajpura.
